name: Alfred Communications
tagline: Great ideas are born of intelligent conversations.
description:
Alfred is a young creative agency founded in 2003, following the phenomenal success of the Familiprix campaign. A venture inspired by Jean-François Bernier, one of the most successful creative directors of his generation.
Recognized as one of the best agencies in Quebec, we have been honoured with many creative and marketing awards, including a coveted Silver Lion at Cannes, various Cassie awards, Gold and Silver at the Marketing Awards in Toronto and at the Quebec Créa Awards for advertising.
